The problems are due to that issue with the agent-lb component. As soon as we merge that, we fix all of these issues.

I think we can go forward with this PR. I notice a Flyway DB PR, but that is not all. We need a protocol to create/maintain scripts (especially scripts created in minor versions). Also, in my opinion, if we are going with flyway, we need to lock down on a version, and remove all legacy thing.
Sorry by the delay @rafaelweingartner, I will do it soon. Thanks!
@DaanHoogland now everything is ok again.
